title: Darkest Days: A Southern Zombie Tale
description: A small town in rural Alabama struggles to fight an army of flesh-eating undead...In a small Alabama town, Cara Creed has found her first love, Bryant. As the local boy takes Cara under his wing to teach her the finer points of small town living, their budding high school romance is suddenly overshadowed by the advent of the walking dead. As an undead epidemic spreads destroying everything that they know, Cara and Bryant join a band of survivors in an attempt to hold out until rescue arrives. Surrounded by hungry zombies and dealing with the loss of law and order, they must come to terms with what must be done to keep living one more day.
author: James J. Layton
